name: The Return
description:
A turn-based dungeon-crawler where space to move becomes limited as the evil poison in the air spreads…

Before you lies the slaughtered corpse of Baron Rasec a necro aristocrat that has dominated your homeland for over 200 years. You vowed to destroy him. Your quest is complete. You have rid the land of tyranny and evil! But the stench of the Baron lingers in the air still... Might be best to go home now before it enters your lungs.

It is time to...RETURN

Made for Ludum Dare 42 Jam!

Controls:

UPDATE
New tile indicators!
New Abilities UI! < ---- Use your first ability to clear poison at the cost of HP

Tiles that blink indicate incoming poison, those tiles are still walkable but have a chance to turn into poison.

If you're standing on poison when your turn ends, you will die.

W, A, S, D (North, West, South, East) // Q, E, Z, C (North-West, South-West, South-East, North-East)

or for Numpad users - 8-4-2-6(North, West, South, East) // 7,1,3,9(North-West, South-West, South-East, North-East)

Walk unto a tile to:

  • Attack!
  • Grab and equip an item! ( You will auto-drop any currently equipped)
  • Consume Food to gain HP!
  • Gain XP from killing stuff!
  • Level up for max HP Boost and a new ability!
